strength_details: Clear responsibilities focused on BPM workflows and enterprise integration
Established company (IBM) with global presence and stability
Role specifically focused on data engineering aspects of BPM systems

Limited information about team structure, growth opportunities, and development practices
No explicit mention of career progression or learning opportunities
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers with 3-7 years experience in BPM tools and enterprise systems
Candidates with Appian experience and database skills (Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL)
Engineers seeking stable roles in established enterprise environments
probe_details: Ask about the size and structure of the data/engineering team
Inquire about career progression opportunities within IBM Consulting

leverage_details: Appian experience is specifically required and may be a differentiator
BPM and enterprise integration experience is directly aligned with role requirements
summary.overall_assessment: Stable opportunity for mid-level data engineers with BPM experience seeking roles in established enterprise environments. Clear role definition focused on Appian and enterprise integration, but limited information about team structure, growth opportunities, and modern data practices. Best suited for candidates prioritizing stability over cutting-edge technology.
